Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4641 affecting package shadow-utils for versions less than 4.9-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-4641 affecting package shadow-utils for versions less than 4.9-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package shadow-utils is earlier than 4.9-14, affected by CVE-2023-4641
